charges.charge_description: On or about 8/25/92 in Travis county in the Western District of Texas deft did with intent to defraud alter two US Savings Bonds serial numbers C335978217EE and C335978218EE both payable to John D Ross II in the amt of $100 and did, w/intent to defraud, pass, utter, and publish as true the aforementioned US Savings Bonds to Bank One of Austin, TX, in violation of Title 18 USC, Sections 471 and 472. (Case Number A-95-167-M)
